title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), make the following regulations:
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Temporary 
Measures) (No.7) Regulations 2021 (Revocation) Regulations 2022 and come 
into operation on 22 January 2022.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (temporary measures) (no.7) regulation 2021 (revocation) regulation 2022 come operation 22 january 2022

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), make the following regulations:
heading: 2. The following are revoked:
text_raw:
2. The following are revoked: 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

(d) 

(e) 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 
2021, 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) (Amendment) 
Regulations 2021, 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) (Second 
Amendment) Regulations 2021, 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 
2021 (Amendment) Regulations 2022, and 

the Avian Influenza (Temporary Measures) (No.7) Regulations 
2021 (Second Amendment) Regulations 2022. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

20 January, 2022. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 25th January, 2022.

title: Health and Welfare Act 2013 (No. 15 of 2013), make the following regulations:
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations provide for the removal of temporary measures formerly in 
place to combat the threat posed by avian influenza in Counties Cavan and 
Monaghan. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [25]
